entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
